mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT SUM(FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_READ_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_READ_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_STUDENT WHERE 1=1
)S

SELECT FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT, FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT, FUNNEL_READ_COUNT, FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT, FORMAT(FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT/FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT*100,2) AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_PER, FORMAT(FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT/FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT*100,2) AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_PER, FORMAT(FUNNEL_READ_COUNT/FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT*100,2) AS FUNNEL_READ_PER, FORMAT(FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT/FUNNEL_READ_COUNT*100,2) AS FUNNEL_SELL_PER, FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_WANT, FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT-FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_LOST, FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_WANT, FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT-FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_LOST, FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT AS FUNNEL_READ_WANT, FUNNEL_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_READ_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_READ_COUNT-FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT AS FUNNEL_READ_LOST, FUNNEL_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_SELL_WANT, FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_SELL_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT-FUNNEL_READ_COUNT AS FUNNEL_SELL_LOST FROM( SELECT SUM(FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_FORECAST_READ_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_FLLOW_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_READ_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_READ_COUNT, SUM(FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_SELL_COUNT FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_STUDENT WHERE 1=1
)S
